title: Blaze
description: Some people come into our lives.Some get ripped away from us. Others keep you at distance to save you and themselves.He pushed me away until that night.The streets bled. The dark lingered.And he came for me.My dark prince. Blazing assassin.All the barriers dropped, and he was mine.One night. One breath. One heartbeat.Now we’re running for our lives. Friends and foes at our heels. But I’m not a runner.I’m not a princess or a queen.If you touch what’s mine...I’m trouble.And I’m coming for you.
author: Alexandra  Silva
